item.title: Why Does A Blog Need HTTPS?
item.description: I was at the Ilug-D meet-up, while talking about this blog a friend asked me: Why the need for HTTPS in a blog? I couldn’t answer it accurately. To answer the question accurately, understanding two things is enough: What’s wrong with talking over insecure HTTP? Why use HTTPS? What’s wrong with talking over insecure HTTP?
